forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain And Snow then Chance Rain And Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain and snow between 11pm and midnight, then a chance of rain and snow between midnight and 2am, then rain and snow likely between 2am and 4am, then patchy fog and rain and snow likely. Cloudy, with a low around 36. South southwest wind around 17 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Patchy fog and rain and snow likely before 8am, then patchy fog and rain and snow likely between 8am and 10am, then patchy fog and rain and snow. Cloudy, with a high near 39. Wind chill values as low as 25. South southwest wind around 18 mph, with gusts as high as 24 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.
